description:
On the way home from the beach, Koko falls asleep behind the wheel and gets in an accident. Chinami suffers only a minor injury, but Koko is deeply shocked by the trouble she caused. After that day, Koko stops communicating with everyone.
Representing his worried friends, Banri heads to her house directly and sees...?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ウェイクアップコール
